import { Row, Col, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, Button } from "reactstrap"; const About = () => { return ( {/* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/} {/* Card-1*/} {/* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/} About Tourist Destinations

Tourist Destinations

This application TOURIST DESTINATIONS is a comprehensive platform designed to manage and showcase information about various tourist destinations. Users can view a list of existing tourist destinations, explore detailed information for each entry. Admin can add new destinations with relevant details, update existing entries, and remove destinations from the database.

); }; export default About;
